dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] EchoStar Pakistan v India A/V infringement - EchoStar_NRID12747]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, January 15, 2006 2:53 PM
To: christophers@nr-online.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] EchoStar Pakistan v India A/V infringement -
EchoStar_NRID12747]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] EchoStar Pakistan v India A/V infringement -
EchoStar_NRID12747
Date: Sun, 15 Jan 2006 19:16:32 -0000
From: <christophers@nr-online.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

NetResult Internal Reference:  EchoStar_NRID12747

Please quote the above EchoStar_NRID12747 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue.


Dear Sirs,

We write on behalf of EchoStar Satellite L.L.C. ("EchoStar") the exclusive
worldwide (with the sole exception of India) broadband rights holder for the
2006 Pakistan vs India Cricket Tour (the "Series").



We have noticed that your website, http://www.desi-streams.net/  is
displaying Audio Visual (A/V) content from the above Series.  As you are
aware, you've engaged in such display without obtaining authority or
authorization from EchoStar to do so.


Please be advised that your unauthorized use of EchoStar's intellectual
property constitutes an infringement of EchoStar's exclusive worldwide
(excluding India only) copyrights.  Please immediately cease all such
infringing activities on any and all of your web sites (and elsewhere) and
confirm to us via email that you have done so.


Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an
express or implied waiver of any of EchoStar's rights or remedies, all of
which are expressly reserved.

We have not been able to send a copy of this notice to your client as they
have failed to provide their details in the look-ups.


Formal Declaration


I hereby state that EchoStar is the sole owner of the rights referenced
above and that NetResult is authorized to act on its behalf with  respect to
internet monitoring and compliance.


On behalf of the owner of the exclusive rights with respect to the content
at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that
use of such A/V in the manner complained of is not authorized by the owner,
its agent, or the law.


I, Christopher Stokes, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally
sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.


We thank you for your cooperation.


Yours sincerely,
Christopher Stokes
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA

Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1731
Fax: +44 (0)7092 804032
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.


- --------------------------------------------------------------------
NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management
- --------------------------------------------------------------------



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----

Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

jH1ChzR/DYMtJohuKCReS7M=
=odRB
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
